basics.label: Programmer
basics.name: Lisa Connell
basics.summary: Highly ambitious full stack developer with professional experience and education in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, and C#. Highly organized and detail-oriented professional specializing in exploring customer solutions that work.

element.summary: I painted homes for the elderly who otherwise would have been evicted for HOA violations.

work.summary: I piloted a liaison position between Wayfair and many of our suppliers. I worked extensively with our SQL databases to collate vast amounts of information necessary to the execution of my duties. During my time at Wayfair I developed problem solving and critical thinking skills that quickly advanced my career to Operations Manager within just 9 months.
